article.title: BAE Systems Awarded Marine Corps Order for Headborne Energy Analysis and Diagnostic Systems
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: BAE Systems has received an order from the U.S. Marine Corps for 1,320 headborne energy analysis and diagnostic systems (HEADS), a sensor system placed inside helmets that will help scientists analyze and understand the forces that Marines sustain during impact and blast events that could lead to brain injury.
